content: westward mitts lana fiber co designed by rebecca woelber lanafiber lana_fiber #westwardmitts lanafiberco@outlook com #westwardknitcollection general notes __________________________________________________________________________________________________ yarn approximately 136 yards / 124 m of chunky weight yarn shown in o-wool o-wash chunky 100% machine-washable certified organic merino 122 yards / 111 m per 100g skein slate color needles us #9 / 5 5mm 16 in / 40 cm circular or double point needle or size needed to obtain gauge gauge 18 stitches / 20 row = 4 in / 10 cm in cable pattern blocked size and dimension medium to fit palm circumference 7 5 in / 19 cm and 11 25 in / 28 5 cm long blocked notions removable stitch markers tapestry needle cable needle waste yarn abbreviations __________________________________________________________________________________________________ k knit pm place marker p purl sm skip marker co cast on rm remove marker bobble bind off round round bor beginning of round decrease decreased ptfb purl thru front and back of same stitch st stitch gm gusset marker sts stitches pgm place gusset marker cn cable needle sgm skip gusset marker k2tog knit two stitches together rgm remove gusset marker p2tog purl two stitches together 2/1 lpc slip 2 stitches to cable needle hold in front p1 from left needle k2 from cable needle 2/1 rpc slip 1 stitch to cable needle hold to back k2 from left needle p1 from cable needle 2/2 lc slip 2 stitches to cable needle hold in front k2 from left needle k2 from cable needle 2/2 rc slip 2 stitches to cable needle hold in back k2 from left needle k2 from cable needle lana © fiber co 2019 all rights reserved pattern __________________________________________________________________________________________________ cast on right/left mitt using a twisted german cast on co 31 stitches and join to work in the round making sure not to twist your work place stitch marker for bor ribbing right/left mitt p2 k2 p2 pm k1 p1 4 times k1 pm p2 k2 to end of round work 12 rnds set up round right/left mitt p2 k2 p2 sm k2 p2 k4 p1 sm p2 k2 to end of round lower cuff right/left mitt round 1 p2 k2 p2 sm 2/1 lpc 2/1 rpc 2/1 lpc sm p2 k2 to end of round round 2 p2 k2 p2 sm p1 k4 p2 k2 sm p2 k2 to end of round round 3 p2 k2 p2 sm p1 2/2 rc p2 k2 sm p2 k2 to end of round round 4 p2 k2 p2 sm p1 k4 p2 k2 sm p2 k2 to end of round round 5 p2 k2 p2 sm 2/1 rpc 2/1 lpc 2/1 rpc sm p2 k2 to end of round round 6 p2 k2 p2 sm k2 p2 k4 p1 sm p2 k2 to end of round round 7 p2 k2 p2 sm k2 p2 2/2 lc p1 sm p2 k2 to end of round round 8 p2 k2 p2 sm k2 p2 k4 p1 sm p2 k2 to end of round work rnds 1-8
